newsitem.title: USA: EIS International chairman Porfelli quits.
newsitem.headline: EIS International chairman Porfelli quits.

text.p: EIS International Inc said its chairman and chief executive, Joseph Porfelli, resigned from the company.
James McGowan will assume the positions of president and chief executive, the company said.
Robery Cresci will become the company's chairman.
McGowan joined EIS in April 1996. Previously, he had been president and chief executive of Deluxe Data.
Cresci is managing director of Peck's Management Partners Ltd. He has been a member of EIS' board since 1991, the company said.
Officials at EIS were not immediately available to comment.
